attributes.action: Ban all forms of religious display, ceremony or worship and any form of organised religious gathering.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religious people are often right wing, bigoted, racist, narrow minded, self righteous and alarmingly stupid. Religion is responsible for the most virulent and heinous crimes to humanity as well as presently repressing stem cell research which could be the best thing in medicine since penicillin

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
